lexUnit.name: north.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the direction pointed to by a standard compass (a frequently implicit starting position).

sentence.text: Montaner was built to defend Gaston Phoebus 's lands from attack from the north , and not against raids from the direction of the Pyrenees ; so it seems to face towards Gascony .
